availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bushrod W. Griffin (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary M. White Griffin in Green County, Kentucky, in September 1851. Father of Martha E. Griffin. Married to Adaline Allen Griffin in Barren County, Kentucky, on October 20, 1862. Father of Anna J. Griffin and William Griffin. Farmer in Adair County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Adair County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Green County in 1860. Owned Scott [Unknown] and Ann Jane [Unknown] in Green County in 1861. Farmer in Green County in 1863.
